context_bundle.summary: Jest: JavaScript/TypeScript testing framework by Meta. Zero-config, built-in mocking, snapshot testing, code coverage. Features: Fast parallel execution, watch mode, mock functions, DOM testing (JSDOM), async/await support. Matchers: expect(value).toBe(), toEqual(), toContain(), toThrow(). Mocking: jest.fn(), jest.mock(), jest.spyOn(). Snapshots: expect(component).toMatchSnapshot(). Run: jest (all tests), jest --watch (watch mode), jest --coverage. Config: jest.config.js or package.json.

onboarding.quick_start: Jest: npm install --save-dev jest. Write test (sum.test.js): test('adds 1 + 2 to equal 3', () => { expect(sum(1, 2)).toBe(3); }). Run: npx jest. Matchers: expect(value).toBe(4) (strict equality), .toEqual({a: 1}) (deep equality), .toContain('item'), .toBeNull(), .toBeTruthy(), .toBeGreaterThan(3). Async: test('async data', async () => { const data = await fetchData(); expect(data).toBe('peanut butter'); }). Mock functions: const mockFn = jest.fn(); mockFn.mockReturnValue(42); expect(mockFn()).toBe(42); expect(mockFn).toHaveBeenCalled(). Snapshot: expect(tree).toMatchSnapshot() (creates __snapshots__ folder). Setup/teardown: beforeEach(() => { db.connect(); }); afterEach(() => { db.disconnect(); }). Watch: jest --watch (runs tests on file change). Coverage: jest --coverage (generates coverage/lcov-report/index.html).
common_patterns: Basic test: describe('Calculator', () => { test('multiplies numbers', () => { expect(multiply(2, 3)).toBe(6); }); test('handles zero', () => { expect(multiply(0, 5)).toBe(0); }); })
Async/await: test('fetches user data', async () => { const user = await fetchUser(1); expect(user.name).toBe('Alice'); expect(user.id).toBe(1); })
Promise: test('resolves promise', () => { return fetchData().then(data => { expect(data).toBe('success'); }); })
Mock function: const callback = jest.fn(); processData([1, 2, 3], callback); expect(callback).toHaveBeenCalledTimes(3); expect(callback).toHaveBeenNthCalledWith(1, 1)
Mock module: jest.mock('axios'); axios.get.mockResolvedValue({data: {users: []}}); const users = await fetchUsers(); expect(users).toEqual([])
Spy: const spy = jest.spyOn(math, 'random').mockReturnValue(0.5); const result = rollDice(); expect(result).toBe(3); spy.mockRestore()
Snapshot (React): import renderer from 'react-test-renderer'; test('renders correctly', () => { const tree = renderer.create(<Button>Click</Button>).toJSON(); expect(tree).toMatchSnapshot(); })
Setup/teardown: beforeAll(() => { db.connect(); }); afterAll(() => { db.close(); }); beforeEach(() => { db.clear(); })
Test.each (parametrize): test.each([[1, 1, 2], [1, 2, 3], [2, 1, 3]])('adds %i + %i to equal %i', (a, b, expected) => { expect(a + b).toBe(expected); })

Config (jest.config.js): module.exports = { testEnvironment: 'node', coverageThreshold: { global: { branches: 80, functions: 80, lines: 80, statements: 80 } }, collectCoverageFrom: ['src/**/*.js', '!src/**/*.test.js'] }
